general.desc: Az Open Imperium Galactica indító programja, amely automatikusan letölti a különféle modulok fájljait telepítés, frissítés vagy javítás céljából.
The launcher for the Open Imperium Galactica which can download various module files for install, upgrade or repair purposes.

entry.item: Fix a crash when using planet scaling settings.
Fix the success condition of Mission 3 - Escort Carrier.
Fix a Java 8 incompatibility issue.
Fix a release issue.
The game now requires Java 8 or newer to work!
Add an upgrade info button to the equipment screen to see what and how many items to produce for a max upgrade.
Improved performance of the groundwar rendering. By @hemoridos
Fix for alternate ground unit images not properly optimized for obscurity rendering. By @hemoridos
Add new upgrade shortcut keys to the colony screen: U/Ctrl+U/Ctrl+Shift+U to upgrade one/max/every building. By @deejayy
Add new demolish shortcut keys to the colony screen: Ctrl+Delete/Ctrl+Shift+Delete to demolish one/every building except colony hub. By @deejayy
Small fix to the Trader AI when the player has a trade agreement with another empire.
Option to specify the default auto-build settings for when colonizing or conquering a planet. By @deejayy
More fixes to resolve the unending groundwar issue.
AI will no longer demolish and rebuild a traders spaceport if there is no more room for a military spaceport.
AI will no longer keep building new buildings if there are disabled buildings of the same type.
AI will start pavement at $350k instead of $1M.
Prevent an out-of-money error when the AI decides and executes a build order.
Pavement will now correctly replace the surface features in the minimap display.
Temporary fix for unending groundwar.
Fixed a crash and slowdown caused by multiple fatal hits on a spaceship or structure. By @hemoridos
Various bugfixes and optimizations. By @hemoridos
Diplomacy screen no longer shows defeated empires. By @hemoridos
Rebalance defensive structures in groundwar wrt power, damage and surrender. By @hemoridos
Make sure the rewarded Destroyer 2 prototype shows up in the quick production panel after the mission.
Diplomacy should now be established correctly and not cause a memory overflow.
The AI will now start searching for suitable build locations for shields and projectors around already existing ones. By @hemoridos
Did loudness normalization on generic sound effects to -16 LUFS with some variation on louder sound effects. By @hemoridos
Added explosion variety to space battles. By @hemoridos
Implemented larger sized ship movements in space war. By @hemoridos
Fixed a bug that cancelled fleet attacks of the player before the game established an initial diplomatic relation between the parties.
Translated game into spanish. By @JouseJG and @je-sendra
Rework of pathing in groundwar and spacewar. Experimental grid-based spacewar. By @hemoridos
Fixed global settings overriding the per-save configurations. By @hemoridos
Improving relationship from war to neutral will now stop any in-progress attack fleets. By @hemoridos
Fixed an issue that prevented AI from attacking fleets. By @hemoridos
Fix a render crash due to building footprint changes. Unfortunately, can't repair planets so please rebuild buildings that look odd or clip into each other.
Avoid a diplomatic incident if a planet changes ownership while other fleets are still inbound for attacking the same planet.
Fixed a bug that may result in wrong spacebattle layout and wrong AI behaviors.
Added surface exceptions to building on a race-by-race basis. (By @hemoridos)
Add scrollbars to more options panels. (By @hemoridos)
Defeating the virus carriers in M14 in auto-battle mode now progresses the missions as expected.
Improved ground unit pathing when unit orders change. (By @hemoridos)
Implemented grid based positioning and layout handling in space battles. Preparation for grid-based space pathfinding mode such as the original game did. (By @hemoridos)
Improved the pathfinding in groundwar when moving vehicles in groups. (By @hemoridos)
Smoother vehicle and projectile movements in groundwar in 1x or 2x speeds. (By @hemoridos)
Skirmish alien buildings (that didn't exist in the original and reused human images) now have custom-made images. (By @Péter Kovács)
Auto-upgrading fleet will now attempt to fill vehicle slots from all available inventory, not just the best. (By @hemoridos)
Improved colony screen panning when switching between planets and added panning limits. (By @hemoridos)
Losing 4 or more battles (space, ground) during ranks 1 and 2 will now result in game over.
Improve fleet arrows on the Starmap screen. (By @hemoridos)
Double clicking on enemy units no longer selects all enemy units of the same type. (By @hemoridos)
Fix the Hungarian subtitle for when checking the status of Centronom. (By @hemoridos)
Added missing Hungarian subtitles to some story cutscenes. (By @hemoridos)
The AI should no longer repeatedly demolish and rebuild power plants when worker shortages are present. (By @hemoridos)
Accepting an alliance no longer decreases the relation if it was already higher than 91%. (By @hemoridos)
The AI will no longer deploy its units on top of player-placed units. (By @hemoridos)
Winning spacewar with active player missiles no longer results in the game thinking the player lost the battle. (By @hemoridos)
Weapons now have some target and delay randomization applied to them as well as pixel-level collision detection. Fixes some monotony, sound and hit detection issues. (By @hemoridos)
Fixed the upgrade description of the Water Vaporator; it increases population growth, not living space amount.
Added missing German labels that caused a warning-crash.
Capturing a planet will grant the building techs to the winner again. The previous restriction was logically inconsistent and could be bypassed reloading a save anyway.
Fix a crash in the equipment screen when pressing the Del button.
Holding Shift while clicking on the Add/Del/Sell buttons add/remove/sell 10 items at once.
Loading a save with a particular corruption (owned planet without race info) no longer causes crashes.
The game should no longer crash if a target planet "disappeared" when targeted by colonization.
The colonizers should no longer move choppily towards a colonization target.
The game should now properly reload each player's known visible/named planet set.
Vehicles no longer appear as if they are behind/obscured by a surface feature that was paved over.
Fortification losses are now correctly accounted to you or the enemy, depending on whose planet it was.
Remove unfinished buildings when winning an Auto-Battle.
Unfinished buildings are no longer considered for technology capturing.
Buildings with research level above the current world level will no longer be awarded to the player when capturing an alien planet.
Do not allow the black market to sell items above the player level
Relationship deterioration specified via the custom balance settings will now only apply in rank Admiral (level 4) and above.
File access will no longer crash if there is a directory with the expected filename among the saves/resources.
The diplomacy screen should no longer crash when viewing certain messages in certain situations.
Fixed a crash when playing a skirmish game without Dargslans.
Fixed the skirmish game "Human vs. AI" referencing non-existent technology in its battle definition.
The game no longer crashes when it tries to award the "A pirate in need" achievement.
Awarding the "Newbie" achievement no longer overlaps with the first time showing of the Objectives panel.
Fix the achievement screen not showing the last item when scrolled to the bottom.
When holding SHIFT while clicking -10 and +10 buttons on the Production Screen, the production amount is changed by -100 and +100 respectively.
Holding CTRL and SHIFT while clicking on a production line's left/right amount change button on the Production Screen now adjusts the amount by 100.
Added tooltips to the Custom Balance Settings screen's buttons indicating using SHIFT will speed up the amount changes.
Tooltips that would show below a control and would clip outside the game window now properly shows above the control.
Fixed a crash and lack of UI indicator when buying a station on the black market and the delivery target does not have the required military spaceport there.
Update the achievement system to be able to track and display progress of many achievements.
Clicking on a message on the Bridge while a message is being played no longer plays multiple messages at the same time.
The Equipment screen now counts the hitpoints and damage output of stations in the summation.
AI colonization limit changes due to entering Level 4 (Admiral) are now saved and loaded correctly. Note: the game can only fix older saves which are already in Level 5 (Grand Admiral).
Fix minor typo in galaxy statistics.
Fix "E.T. Exists" awarded too eagerly after the last fix.
The AI will now pave planets.
The Equipment screen will now update correctly if the AI adds a station to the current planet.
The AI will now remove excess vehicles and houses from planets.
The AI will no longer repeatedly stop and resume moving colonization fleets.
The AI will now properly undeploy Rocket Sled 1s when upgrading the ground forces.
Fix "E.T. Exists" not awarded if the aliens detected the player first.
Fix "Nobel Prize" awarded too early because of counting the Thorin.
The AI will now properly unequip obsolete rockets from space stations before equipping newer rocket types.
The AI will no longer overfill the rockets on space stations beyond the intended capacity.
The AI will no longer deploy tanks, fleets or stations if the target planet has changed owner.
The AI will now properly upgrade the vehicle mixture on planets and will not overfill them.
The AI will no longer remove obsolete vehicles before their replacements are available for deployment.
Added missing label for when the colonists have nowhere to go when abandoning a colony.
Fixed the logic that checks if alien colonists can be resettled to another planet within the current empire.
Buying ships from the black market now adds them to the player's nearby fleet instead of anybody's fleet.
Selecting an equipment slot that is located at the bottom of a ship is now possible if the game window is small.
The selected equipment slot info no longer remains on screen when switching to split/transfer mode.
The selected equipment is no longer shown in large form when switching between fleets or ending join/transfer.
Relocating aliens to their native empire now distributes them among all their planets (instead of one less).
Added an UI toolbelt with buttons for the pavement and other features in this patch
New feature: Ability to move colonists between planets (at a cost).
New feature: Ability to abandon a colony (at a cost).
New feature: pave over larger surface features so they become buildable/passable. Use the key P to enable this mode. UI to come later.
New screen: Custom Balance Settings. Accessible via the Campaign screen or via CTRL+6 from ingame. It allows buffing aliens and modifying how morale is calculated.
Fixed Mission 17 - Destroy Prototype, where the Garthog ships would exit the wrong side of the screen when the battle happened over a friendly planet.
Fixed the database screen with stuck ship title overlapping the alien descriptions upon screen switching back and forth.
Fixed the database screen label errors when playing a Skirmish game and looking at the alien races.
Fixed the test video/screen overlapping with message playback triggered from the statusbar's Message indicator.
Fixed the test screen remaining open when loading an earlier save.
In Mission 12 - San Sterling Virus, Traders traveling towards San Sterling will now get the blinking red border too.
Fixed performance regression in rendering partially hidden vehicles.
Improved compatibility with newer Java versions.
Fixed the map editor not properly saving 1x1 tiles.
Fixed Mission 6 (Defend Achilles) not succeeding if the Garthogs flee with their fleet still having ground attack capability.
Added default defensive deployment locations for planets without buildings.
Fixed an issue with AI deploying to unreachable locations via deployment exclusions.
Fixed an issue with planets becoming non-operational upon level-up in the campaign.
Adding fighters to a planet with maxed out vehicles via the Add button now works correctly.
Added some missing German labels causing an error dialog to pop up.
Fixed a potential issue with assigning initial planets to players.
Colony screen behavior were not using the zoom factor.
Skip deployment if there are no tanks to deploy.
Text corrections.
Fix the duplicate planet Exterior 19
Fixed Trader AI overriding the script-designated chat back to the default chat.
Fixed some parametric russian labels.
Added missing Hungarian labels about the settings screen.
The button Start Battle is now only visible if all vehicles have been deployed.
Fixed the trade screen's bounding box.
Fixed the tooltip on the building upgrade panel remaining visible after clicking on the upgrade star.
AI no longer does research before level 3.
AI on easy no longer deploys tanks to the planet's capacity but only 2/3.
Fix the Escort Prototype mission not failing if the prototype gets destroyed but its escort survives.
Framerate statistics is not turned off by default. Use CTRL+F to toggle it.
Fix AI ignoring colony needs in certain energy conditions.
AI no longer builds cheap buildings (housing, food factory) in case there is an energy shortage.
Fix for research screen loosing the current technology when a research completes.
In ground battle, the start battle button now shows only if all vehicles have been deployed.
Walking around the ship now uses custom mouse cursors. Thanks @p-smith!
Scaled spacewar screen now properly displays mouse cursor over objects. Thanks @Zalewa
Fixed error in case the user and the auto-build removed a building at the same time.
Fixed tax and population calculation resulting in NaN to prevent proper planet death and causing other calculations to go haywire.
Fixed the continue button to be properly enabled/disabled after profile change.
Updated links to point to the project's new location: https://github.com/akarnokd/open-ig
Fixed planet selection box not working. The box lists all player planets and depending on the item type, it may display "No room" for spaceports and "No mil. spaceport" for ships and fighters.
Fixed wrong subtitle text in the Hungarian win video.
Fixed the +++ button not filling up the available vehicle count with vehicles.
AI ships no longer stay in one place if the player attacked a planet the enemy fleet is next to.
Fixed crash due invalid diplomatic relation entries caused by Mission 4.
Fixed NPE caused by losing mouse status information due desktop switch/UAC.
AI will build ground cannons without unnecessary delays.
AI will upgrade static defenses without unnecessary delays.
Fixed unit movement sometimes not correctly rotated into the movement direction.
Increased ground cannon damage against fighters.
Fixed crash in Mission 4 (two pirates).
Added hp-skirmish attribute to battle.xml settings under space-entities/tech to allow specifying the hitpoints of the entry in skirmish games.
Added space-skirmish attribute to battle.xml settings under buildins/hitpoints to allow specifying the hitpoints of a building in skirmish games.

Halved the hitpoints of Space station 2, Space station 3, Plasma projector, Particle Projector and Meson projector in the campaign. For example, 3 Space station 3s with 5 Meson Projectors and a Hypershield will whitstand a full strength Dargslan attack by a margin of 25%, i.e., 2 structures will survive the encounter generally while the attacker is mostly destroyed.
Fixed AI sending ill-equipped fleets to attack.
Fixed some skirmish ships to be available to alien races during the campaign.
Fixed Trader AI causing some problems with 3-way space battles (crash, wrong chat).
Increased the initial money of aliens to 100,000 cr in the campaign to to better jump-start their economy.
AI no longer produces items on level 1 in the campaign.
Switching to other races in the campaign stops the main mission timers (helps greatly when debugging).
CTRL+SHIFT+W destroys all enemy structures in spacewar (except Trader ships).
Fixed ordering of planets with issues (somehow, it was reversed and the AI operated on the planet with the best conditions, not the worst one).
Fixed AI unable to build a power plant if the missing energy was above the capacity of available power plant types.

general.desc: Az Open Imperium Galactica térképszerkesztő programja, amellyel meglévő és új térképek szerkeszthetők.
The Map Editor for the Open Imperium Galactica, which can create a new or edit an existing map.
A játék videóit játsza le és exportálja.
Plays and exports the videos of the game.
